Verses: 1 buththiyulla Sthree Than Veettaikkattugiraal; Buththiyillaadha Sthreeyo Than Kaigalinaal Adhai Idiththuppodugiraal.
2 nidhaanamaai Nadakkiravan Karththarukku Bayappadugiraan; Than Vazhigalil Thaarumaaraanavano Avarai Alatchiyampannugiraan.
3 moodan Vaayile Avan Agandhaikketra Milaarundu; Gnaanavaangalin Udhadugalo Avargalaik Kaappaatrum.
4 erudhugalillaadha Idaththil Kalanjiyam Verumaiyaayirukkum; Kaalaigalin Belaththinaalo Migundha Varaththundu.
5 meysaatchikkaaran Poisollaan; Poisaatchikkaarano Poigalai Oodhugiraan.
6 pariyaasakkaaran Gnaanaththaith Thediyum Kandupidiyaan; Buththiyullavanukko Arivu Lesaai Varum.
7 moodanudaiya Mugaththukku Vilagippo; Arivulla Udhadugalai Ange Kaanaai.
8 than Vazhiyai Sindhiththukkolvadhu Vivegiyin Gnaanam; Moodargaludaiya Vanjanaiyo Moodaththanam.
9 moodar Paavaththaikkuriththup Pariyaasampannugiraargal; Needhimaangalukkulle Dhayai Undu.
10 irudhayaththin Kasappu Irudhayaththirke Theriyum; Adhin Magizhchchikku Anniyan Udandhaiyaagaan.
11 dhunmaarkkanudaiya Veedu Azhiyum; Semmaiyaanavanudaiya Koodaaramo Sezhikkum.
12 manushanukku Semmaiyaaith Thondrugira Vazhi Undu; Adhin Mudivo Marana Vazhigal.
13 nagaippilum Manadhukku Dhukkamundu; Andha Magizhchchiyin Mudivu Sanjalam.
14 pinvaangum Irudhayamullavan Than Vazhigalileyum, Nalla Manushano Thannile Thaanum Thrupthiyadaivaan.
15 pedhaiyaanavan Endha Vaarththaiyaiyum Nambuvaan; Vivegiyo Than Nadaiyinmel Gavanamaayirukkiraan.
16 gnaanamullavan Bayandhu Theemaikku Vilagugiraan; Madhiyeenano Moorkkankondu Thunigaramaayirukkiraan.
17 murkobi Madhikettai Seyvaan; Dhurchsindhanaikkaaran Verukkappaduvaan.
18 pedhaiyar Buththiyeenaththai Sudhandharikkiraargal; Vivegigalo Arivinaal Mudisoottappadugiraargal.
19 theeyor Nallorukku Munbaagavum, Dhunmaarkkar Needhimaangaludaiya Vaasarpadigalilum Kunivadhundu.
20 thariththiran Thanakkaduththavanaalum Pagaikkappadugiraan; Aisuvariyavaanukko Anega Snegidharundu.
21 piranai Avamadhikkiravan Paavancheygiraan; Thariththiranukku Irangugiravano Baakkiyamadaivaan.
22 theemaiyai Yosikkiravargal Thavarugiraargalallavo? Nanmaiyai Yosikkiravargalukko Kirubaiyum Saththiyamumundu.
23 sagala Prayaasaththinaalum Prayojanamundu; Udhadugalin Pechcho Varumaiyai Maaththiram Tharum.
24 gnaanigalukku Mudi Avargal Selvam; Moodarin Madhiyeenam Moodaththaname.
25 meysaatchi Sollugiravan Uyirgalai Ratchikkiraan; Vanjanaikkaarano Poigalai Oodhugiraan.
26 karththarukku Bayappadugiravanukkuth Thidanambikkai Undu; Avan Pillaigalukkum Adaikkalam Kidaikkum.
27 karththarukku Bayappadudhal Jeevaootru; Adhinaal Maranakkannigalukkuth Thappalaam.
28 janaththiratchi Raajaavin Magimai, Janakkuraivu Thalaivanin Murivu.
29 neediya Saandhamullavan Magaabuththimaan; Murkobiyo Buththiyeenaththai Vilangappannugiraan.
30 sosthamanam Udalukku Jeevan; Poraamaiyo Elumburukki.
31 thariththiranai Odukkugiravan Avanai Undaakkinavarai Nindhikkiraan; Thariththiranukku Dhayaiseygiravano Avarai Ganampannugiraan.
32 dhunmaarkkan Than Theemaiyile Vaarikkollappaduvaan; Needhimaano Than Maranaththile Nambikkaiyullavan.
33 buththimaanudaiya Irudhayaththil Gnaanam Thangum; Madhiyeenaridaththil Ulladho Velippadum.
34 needhi Janaththai Uyarththum; Paavamo Endha Janaththukkum Igazhchchi.
35 raajaavin Dhayai Vivegamulla Panividaikkaaranmelirukkum; Avanudaiya Kobamo Lachchaiyundaakkugiravan Melirukkum.
